descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kemba Walker follows up his 40-point performance by scoring 26 points in the Hornets' 97-84 win over the Knicks.
videos.headline: Hornets hand Knicks second-straight loss
